org.cloudifysource.esc.driver.provisioning.openstack
Class OpenStackBaseClient

java.lang.Object
  org.cloudifysource.esc.driver.provisioning.openstack.OpenStackBaseClient
Direct Known Subclasses:
OpenStackComputeClient, OpenStackNetworkClient
public abstract class OpenStackBaseClient
extends Object

A base class for openstack clients.
It handle tokens.

Since:
2.7.0
Author:
victor
